input_text:
Job Title: Technical Project Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Senior Technical Project Manager - Remote

Who We Are

We are a small deep tech startup with specialized capacities in behavior change solutions, offering a proven combination of behavioral psychology, data analytics, and digital communications. Our company focuses effectively on creating science-based solutions that tend to embrace social purpose and enhance the quality of peopleâ€™s lives by creating a variety of products that use cutting-edge machine learning and data science methods to model, segment, and create the products

Job Summary

As a Senior Technical Project Manager, you will be responsible for managing the development and delivery of projects to completion. You will work closely with Data Engineers, DevOps Engineers, Mobile Engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure timely and efficient delivery of high-quality products. The ideal candidate will have experience working in a fast-pace start-up environment and will be comfortable working with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities

Implement strategies that deliver projects on schedule and within budget by leading project planning and execution, defining project scope, goals, and deliverables, and tracking project progress against timelines and budgets.Manage project risks and issues by identifying and mitigating potential risks and resolving issues as they arise.Leverage project management tools to track project performance and schedule adherence.Conduct risk assessments for projects to minimize project risks.Manage resources for projects, such as computer equipment and employees.Coordinate project team members and develop individual responsibilities and schedules.Organize and lead meetings to discuss project goals and progress.Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation and develop comprehensive project plans to be shared with stakeholders.Report and escalate to leadership as needed.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.Project Management Certification such as PMP is highly preferred.10+ years of experience in Project Management with a proven track record of managing and delivering large complex technical projects on time and within budget.Superior problem-solving and decision-making skills.Experience using MS Office and MS Project.Strong communication and leadership skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Experience translating business requests into discrete efforts requiring specific technical, functional, and/or operational evaluation.Superior problem-solving and decision-making skills.Strong facilitation skills.Solid organization skills with attention to detail and ability to multitask.Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.Ability to craft clear and convincing presentation materials.Start-up experience is a plus.

If you are a highly motivated individual who enjoys working in a fast-paced start-up environment and has a passion for technology, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Salary: $150,000 - $190,000/yr plus bonus & equity.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
Ability to craft clear and convincing presentation materials

Defining project scope, goals, and deliverables
Tracking project progress against timelines and budgets
Using project management tools to track performance and schedule adherence
Managing resources such as computer equipment and employees
Coordinating project team members and developing individual responsibilities and schedules

Reporting and escalating to leadership as needed
